item.title: White House Decimates Entire Staff Behind Small Business-Friendly Capital Program
item.description: While CDFIs may not be the first stop for capital for most entrepreneurs, stripping it of its team is a blow to access to capital.

item.title: Ex-Apple CEO John Sculley Says This Company Is Apple’s First ‘Real Competitor’ in Years
item.description: Sculley led Apple from 1983 to 1993. He has some thoughts about how the company is doing today.

item.title: Why Your Company’s Reputation Matters More Than Ever to Jobseekers
item.description: The job market may be tough, but applicants are still being selective.

item.title: Taylor Swift’s Fans Are Angry About Her Use of AI. It’s a Warning to All Leaders
item.description: After Taylor Swift launched a video apparently made with AI, #SwiftiesAgainstAI is trending. It’s a reminder to be careful of AI backlash.

item.title: How Tighter RTO Rules May Cost Employers High Performer Pet Owners
item.description: A new report shows employees with pets will bolt jobs that reduce their flexibility to work in the company of their animals.
